english.segment1: "KICK START" - his overdue life as a star. waiting tables hadn't done that so far. "SPOTLIGHT" - a dream for many a year. the leather jacket, Jimmy's ever ready stage wear
english.segment2: sorry I'm not your cup o'tea. but I don't mind. Yeah, I said I don't mind. at least I know you're thinking about me. yeah, I don't mind. yeah, I said I don't mind
english.segment3: "GOOD STUFF, PEOPLE DON'T KNOW WHEN THEY HEAR!". Mumbled something `bout "PEARLS IN A PIG'S EAR". "OLD SCHOOL" thirty two and knowing it all. who wants to listen to a single-sided phone call?
english.segment4: sorry I'm not your cup o'tea. but I don't mind. yeah, I said I don't mind. at least I know you're thinking about me. yeah, I don't mind. yeah, I said I don't mind
english.segment5: bring it all into perspective. the tongue will steer the ship ahoy. spark up a flame. feel the pain of habanero sauce. a word's forever. when we speak we set `em free. so watch your mouth. and you be careful what you say, Jimmy
english.segment6: sorry I'm not your cup o'tea. but I don't mind. yeah, I said I don't mind. at least I know you're thinking about me. yeah, I don't mind. ahh, maybe I do mind
